channel.title: [317]Help on adding a 'buy x' option to shops?[317]
channel.description: How do I add a 'Buy X' option to a 317 server so that when people choose it it will ask how many quantities of that item they want to buy.

item.title: [317]Help on adding a 'buy x' option to shops?[317]

item.description:
@Da_0wnz wrote:

How do I add a ‘Buy X’ option to a 317 server so that when people choose it it will ask how many quantities of that item they want to buy.
